comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: Aerial view of Byrd Field terminal & ramp in Richmond, Virginia. Visible on the ramp is a Delta Airlines Douglas DC-4 (right), an Eastern Air Lines DC-3 (center) and another unmarked DC-3 (left).

comment._content: auch schon n bisschen älter das Foto, wie es scheint...

comment._content: I love the Eastern Air DC-3 livery. All that polished metal!!
